ResearchProjectDef.label: The 1860's
ResearchProjectDef.description: Allows for the production of simple, cap and ball and very early metallic cartridge rifles and revolvers.

ResearchProjectDef.label: The 1870's
ResearchProjectDef.description: Allows for the production of more advanced rifle actions and metallic cartridge ammunitions.

ResearchProjectDef.label: The 1880's
ResearchProjectDef.description: Allows for the production of complex and powerful rifles and revolvers.

ResearchProjectDef.label: The 1890's
ResearchProjectDef.description: Allows for the production of smokeless powder cartridges, more powerful rifles, and more complex actions.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Scopes
ResearchProjectDef.description: Allows for the production of scopes, increasing the accuracy of select rifles.
